characterDescription: The tavern innkeeper in Kholinar is a native Alethi.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a short, heavyset man with a paunch so thick he looks like a big chull egg.
characterDetails.History:
According to the man, Wit (whom he calls Storyteller), was supposed to draw customers to his place, indicating that Wit said it would be full.
Wit replies that he is full, but of what, he did not say, as Wit did not wish to sully his tongue.
